name: CatJam (Frib)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 51 - "Every 10 Seconds"

First person puzzle escape room with a twist. There are 5 endings, each playthrough lasts a few minutes at minimum. Playtest among friends took 15 minutes on average to beat it on their first attempt.

If you are having trouble with the webGL version, please use the windows executable instead. FPS games and webGL are a bit iffy. When running the executable, there is no way to quit the game except for alt+f4 for now

Want to skip the minute-long intro on repeat playthroughs? Look for a secret button in the waiting room!
